name.description: Name of the rumble. Can be ignored for anonymous rumble effects.

duration.description: The time the rumble will take. -1 for continues effect

fade.description: Rumble effect gets weaker towards the passed time.

factor.description: How much to slow down the time. 0.5 = half the speed

time.description: Transition time for slow motion removal

duration.description:
Amount of time to play animation.
0 = actual lenght of animation, -1 = forever until stopped.

align.description: Alignment of Animation relative to target

group.description: A string identifying the effect. Optional. Name can be used with CLEAR_EFFECT to clear only certain effects

waitSkip.description: The amount of seconds to skip waiting before effect is over

target2Align.description: Alignment of Animation relative to target

ignoreSlowMo.description: If true: ignore slow motion for this effect

guiInfo.description: Type and Settings of GUI to spawn

removeAfterwards.description: True if image should be removed after transition

name.description: Name of image to be removed

playSound.description: True if the nudge sound should be played

guiSprite.description: If true: Show sprite as GUI Sprite

size.description: Optional: Size of entity. If not specified will match image dimensions to x and z size, y always 0

time.description: Transition time to new overlay color and alpha

circleSize.description: Size of visible circle in center. 1=fullSize

transition.description: If true, slowly fade in effects

circleSize.description: Size of visible circle in center. 1=fullSize

alpha.description: Alpha of Screen blur. The lower, the stronger the effect

target.description: Target on which to focus zoom blur

quantity.description: Quantity of particles (average number of visible particles)

immediately.description: If true, change weather immediately with no transition

name.description: Name of the timer to access it. Must be unique

millis.description: Set false if millis should be shown

gui.description: True if a gui should be added to the top-right

duration.description: Time in seconds the timer should update. Only applicable for COUNTDOWN mode.

area.description: Only update timer when inside this area.

temp.description: True if the timer should be deleted once a map has been switched

quest.description: If the timer hits the duration on COUNTDOWN mode or your leave the map and the temp property is set to true.

assist.description: If true: scale time with puzzle speed assist parameter

duration.description: New duration time if any. Only valid when timer is COUNTDOWN

Name of the timer to pause.

trophy.description: The Trophy to unlock, if already unlocked, nothing will happen.

pos.description: Position of mouse in screen pixels. 0,0 = top left

duration.description: Duration to move mouse to this position

value.description: Type of value for the axis

duration.description: Time in seconds to hold the stick in that direction. If 0 = hold forever.

value.description: Value for action. 1 usually makes sense

hold.description: True if action should be hold

deviceFilter.description: Only do action for a specific device
Only do action for a specific device

hide.description: True if the timer should be hidden and removed.

entity.description: Entity to show AR Message on

time.description: Time in seconds the message should be visible. 0 = forever

partName.description: If provided: Show AR display to sub part of entity

fadeIn.description: Color fade in time in seconds

unequip.description: If true, unequip the item, if it is equipped

name.description: Name of the enemy to access via action

startAction.description: Action that is immediately performed on enemy

noEffects.description: If true: Do not show appear effect.

onDestructIncrease.description: Variable to increase by one when destroyed

onPreDestructIncrease.description: Variable to increase by one when destroyed

name.description: Name of the enemy to access via action

enemyType.description: If provided: only remove enemy of this type

enemyState.description: State of Enemy to switch to

value.description: Relative amount of HP entity should have. 1= FULL HP
Relative amount of HP to regen. 1= FULL HP

showNumbers.description: if true: do not show healing numbers

speed.description: Speed of combat, will scale frequency of enemy attacks

regExp.description: Regular Expression used on entityName to find entities

enemyInfo.description: Enemy type to swap with entities

manualKill.description: Instead of killing the enemy, set specified variable to true.

expCollect.description: Manually kill enemy, collecting EXP etc.

varName.description: Variable to store relative hp in

enemies.description: List of all enemies that participate in battle

tmpTarget.description: Temp target to set temporarily while combat condition is evaluated

group.description: Only remove proxies with matching group string

floorOption.description: The number of the floor option to use.

observatory.description: True if this is for the observatory challenge.

keepDisplayed.description: Keep Task displayed all the time

task.description: Current perma task of the game. Displayed in Synopsis

stop.description: If true: stop music in pause menu.

value.description: Type of Mobility block. SAVE also blocks teleport

text.description: If defined: enable cancel button with this text. If undefined: disable cancel button

value.description: True if combat should remain active.
Increase Combat Rank by this weight. 1=one enemy

outgoing.description: If true: this is an outgoing call

forceWidth.description: Override the default button width. NOTE: Buttons still get matched when a text is to large.

name.description: Name to display under portrait if any

order.description: Determines the order in which people are displayed on one side. LOWER values are in FRONT

clearSide.description: Clear the side before adding the person

entity.description: Entity the dream text will be displayed above or below. Text will be centered on screen if not specified

posType.description: Whether to display text above or below entity.

time.description: If set the message will stay on for the given amount of time

image.description: Image to be shown over content text

options.description: All the options of the modal dialog

direction.description: Direction to show text relative to marker square.

connectPos.description: Point where text line touches marker box. Between 0 to 1. 0= left corner, 1=right corner.

stopTime.description: If true: Stop time while displaying the message
If true: Stop time while displaying the message

observatory.description: True if this is for the observatory challenge.
True if this is for the observatory challenge.

side.description: If defined: moved board message to side of screen, allowing to display persons in parallel

frequency.description: Frequency of NPC Runners. Null = no NPC runners

name.description: Name of player config

level.description: Wait until this level of charge has been reached

skipEffect.description: If true: do no show effects of changing elements
If true: do no show effects of changing elements

varName.description: Will include the type of combat art THROW, ATTACK, DASH or GUARD

value.description: Speed of CrossHair. 1 is default, 0 is pause

pos.description: If defined, reset to this position

zHeight.description: From how height the bomb will fall

zVary.description: Value to +- vary the z height

pointA.description: Point of first platform to be fixed

pointB.description: If defined: Rise all platforms overlapping with the bounding box of A and B

height.description: How high platforms should be fixed

minHeight.description: If defined, will vary height randomly between this value and height

enemy.description: Enemy to unlock, note that this enemy, use this only for special enemies.

asSpecial.description: if true 'special' will be displayed instead of kill count

lore.description: Lore to unlock. Unlocks ALL entries

notify.description: True if notification should be displayed

lore.description: Lore to the entry is associated with

landmark.description: Landmark to set state of. If not defined: Set state of all landmarks of area (if found)

chestId.description: Entity id of the chest that is no more

variable.description: Alternative Variable used for chest. Do NOT add map. prefix!

shop.description: The Shop to access. Below you can see the content

area.description: Visited area to be undone. WARNING: Will delete ALL map variables of those maps

withBranches.description: If true, use branches to determine whether things where traded or not.

name.description: Name of the quest

rewards.description: The rewards the player gets for completing the quest.

map.description: Map to show instead of the automated one

npc.description: NPC that will turn into the party member

skipEffect.description: If true: skip NPC show effect

temporary.description: If true: add Party member temporary

updateEquipment.description: If true, also update equipment of party member

noDie.description: If true: party member won't die, even if you kill him

allElements.description: If true: has all elements. If false: has all elements player has

npc.description: NPC that will turn into the party member

skipEffect.description: If true: skip NPC show effect

battle.description: Battie AI Factor: 0=default, 1=always the best possible decision.

aggressive.description: Aggressiveness Factor: 0=default, 1=attacks as often as possible

targeting.description: Influence enemy targeting behavior: 0=default, 1=enemies will always target party members

callEvent.description: Call event that will be called.

commonEventType.description: Type of Common Event to cancel

name.description: Name of the section. MUST BE GIVEN

credits.description: Name of the credit section gui which contains the trigger

offscreen.description: If true, waits until credits entry is really offscreen

amount.description: Increases the chain by the given amount

scoreType.description: Score type to ignore, gets reset every round.

type.description: Type of the score. This is used to for the list at the end of the round.

custom.description: If true, open menu for custom cups.

noWait.description: If true, do not wait for menu to be closed in order to continue events

silent.description: If true, do now show any effects

increase.description: If true, increase the current wave counter before spawning the wave

focusPlayer.description: If true, enemies will focus the player. Only if this is true the drammatic effect is auto set

timeGui.description: Enable/Disable Timer Gui. Default is true

onDeath.description: If true, round was ended through player death

wait.description: If true, wait until the gui has finished animating.
